meanings.definition: A plural form of the word 'tryp'
meanings.sent1: The tryps in the book were all misspelled.
meanings.sent2: She collected many tryps of different colors.
meanings.sent3: The tryps decided to have a spelling bee.

meanings.sent1: He tryps, she tryps, it tryps - that's how the story goes.

meanings.definition: The present participle form of the verb 'tryp'
meanings.sent1: Tryps swimming in the pond caught her attention.
